query.statement:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT A.UPJANG , A.UPJANGNM_DISP AS UPJANG_NM , E.GUBUN , DECODE(E.GUBUN,'채권양도',E.SETUP_DATE,DECODE(E.SETUP_DATE, NULL, '', TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(E.SETUP_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD'))) AS SETUP_DATE , DECODE(E.GUBUN,'채권양도',E.EXPIRE_DATE,DECODE(E.EXPIRE_DATE, NULL, '', TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(E.EXPIRE_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD'))) AS EXPIRE_DATE , E.SECURE_AMT , A.CREDIT_AMOUNT , CASE WHEN A.CREDIT_END <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') THEN A.CREDIT_OVER_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END AS OVER_AMOUNT , C.TM_NM , A.PART_SALES_SABUN , C.TM_CD , A.USE_YN , E.CANCEL_YN , DECODE(E.CANCEL_YN,'Y','해지','설정') AS CANCEL_YN_NM , E.TRAN_YN , E.PNAME , E.JUMINNO , (SELECT MAX(Y.CODE_NAME)||' '||MAX(PAY_DATE) FROM SCO_UPJANG_CUST Z, SCC_COMMON_CODE Y WHERE Y.GROUP_CODE = 'MA0015' AND Y.CODE = Z.PAY_GUBUN_CD AND Z.UPJANG = A.UPJANG) AS PAY_GUBUN , A.MAIN_UPJANG , C.MU_CD , C.MU_NM , '[' || A.DEPT_ID || ']' || (SELECT Q.CC_NM FROM SCC_CC Q WHERE Q.CC_CD = A.DEPT_ID) AS CC_NM , '[' || A.PART_SALES_SABUN || ']' || (SELECT P.NM_KOR FROM SCC_USERINFOV P WHERE P.SABUN = A.PART_SALES_SABUN) AS PART_SALES_NM , A.CREDIT_END FROM FMS_UPJANG A , FMS_UPJANG B , HLDC_SC_DEPT_V C , ( SELECT A.UPJANG , '부동산' AS GUBUN , A.LAND_SETUP_DATE AS SETUP_DATE , '' AS EXPIRE_DATE , A.LAND_AMT AS SECURE_AMT , A.LAND_CANCEL_YN AS CANCEL_YN , 'N' AS TRAN_YN , '' AS PNAME , '' AS JUMINNO FROM FMS_SECURE_LAND A UNION ALL SELECT A.UPJANG , '보증보험' AS GUBUN , A.GUARAN_BEGIN_DATE AS SETUP_DATE , A.GUARAN_EXPIRE_DATE AS EXPIRE_DATE , A.GUARAN_AMT AS SECURE_AMT , A.GUARAN_CANCEL_YN AS CANCEL_YN , 'N' AS TRAN_YN , '' AS PNAME , '' AS JUMINNO FROM FMS_SECURE_GUARANTEE A UNION ALL SELECT A.UPJANG , '인보증' AS GUBUN , A.PERSON_SETUP_DATE AS SETUP_DATE , '' AS EXPIRE_DATE , A.PERSON_LIMIT_AMT AS SECURE_AMT , A.PERSON_CANCEL_YN AS CANCEL_YN , 'N' AS TRAN_YN , A.PERSON_NAME AS PNAME --, A.PERSON_JUMINNO AS JUMINNO , SC_CRYPTO_FUN('DEC', A.PERSON_JUMINNO_ENC , '1') AS JUMINNO FROM FMS_SECURE_PERSON A UNION ALL SELECT A.UPJANG , '현금보증' AS GUBUN , A.CASH_DEPOSIT_DATE AS SETUP_DATE , '' AS EXPIRE_DATE , A.CASH_AMT AS SECURE_AMT , A.CASH_CANCEL_YN AS CANCEL_YN , 'N' AS TRAN_YN , '' AS PNAME , '' AS JUMINNO FROM FMS_SECURE_CASH A UNION ALL SELECT A.UPJANG , '질권' AS GUBUN , A.PLEDGER_BEGIN_DATE AS SETUP_DATE , A.PLEDGER_EXPIRE_DATE AS EXPIRE_DATE , A.PLEDGER_AMT AS SECURE_AMT , A.PLEDGER_CANCEL_YN AS CANCEL_YN , 'N' AS TRAN_YN , '' AS PNAME , '' AS JUMINNO FROM FMS_SECURE_PLEDGER A UNION ALL SELECT A.UPJANG , '채권양도' AS GUBUN , A.TRAN_COPY AS SETUP_DATE , A.TRAN_DESC AS EXPIRE_DATE , 0 AS SECURE_AMT , 'N' AS CANCEL_YN , 'Y' AS TRAN_YN , '' AS PNAME , '' AS JUMINNO FROM FMS_SECURE_TRANSFER A UNION ALL SELECT A.UPJANG , '예치보증금' AS GUBUN , A.GUARAN_BEGIN_DATE AS SETUP_DATE , A.GUARAN_EXPIRE_DATE AS EXPIRE_DATE , A.GUARAN_AMT AS SECURE_AMT , A.GUARAN_CANCEL_YN AS CANCEL_YN , 'N' AS TRAN_YN , '' AS PNAME , '' AS JUMINNO FROM FMS_SECURE_DEPO_GUARANTEE A ) E WHERE A.UPJANG = E.UPJANG(+) AND A.MAIN_UPJANG = B.UPJANG AND A.DEPT_ID = C.DEPT_ID ) A WHERE GUBUN IS NOT NULL
AND A.MU_CD = #MU_CD#
AND A.TM_CD = #TM_CD#
AND A.MAIN_UPJANG = #MAIN_UPJANG#
AND A.GUBUN = #GUBUN#
AND A.EXPIRE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND (A.EXPIRE_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+#EXPIRE_DAY#,'YYYY-MM-DD'))
AND A.PART_SALES_SABUN = #PART_SALES_SABUN#
AND A.UPJANG = #UPJANG#
AND A.CANCEL_YN = #CANCEL_YN#
ORDER BY UPJANG_NM, GUBUN
